info.title: Likefolio Api Endpoints
info.description: Create a session to start to use it

get.summary: Company basic information by ticker.

parameters.description: Api token granted to call the rest of the endpoints. You must call sessions/create to obtain a token and it will be valid for 15 minutes. After that, you must create another session.
parameters.name: apiKey

parameters.description: Ticker of a company.
parameters.name: ticker

get.summary: Company basic information.

parameters.description: Api token granted to call the rest of the endpoints. You must call sessions/create to obtain a token and it will be valid for 15 minutes. After that, you must create another session.
parameters.name: apiKey

parameters.description: ID number of a company
parameters.name: id

get.summary: Returns amount of mentions per day for a given period

parameters.description: Api token granted to call the rest of the endpoints. You must call sessions/create to obtain a token and it will be valid for 15 minutes. After that, you must create another session.
parameters.name: apiKey

parameters.description: ID number of a company
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Start of the period. Must be in ISO8601 format
parameters.name: startDate

parameters.description: End of period. Must be in ISO8601 format
parameters.name: endDate

post.summary: Returns list of tweets ordered by score. Use JSON to do the POST.

parameters.description: Api token granted to call the rest of the endpoints. You must call sessions/create to obtain a token and it will be valid for 15 minutes. After that, you must create another session.
parameters.name: apiKey

parameters.description: ID number of a company
parameters.name: ids[id]

parameters.description: Start of the period. Must be in ISO8601 format.
parameters.name: ids[startDate]

parameters.description: Page to request on a big response
parameters.name: ids[page]

parameters.description: Quantity of records to return
parameters.name: ids[qty]

parameters.description: Filter for sentiment values. Only "all" includes 0.
parameters.name: ids[sentiment]

parameters.description: Order of the results
parameters.name: ids[sort]

parameters.name: resolution
